TopicTitle: [0.17] Flags with Multiple texture options + Make your own flag (v1.3.1)

Articles.Content:
Ever wanted to put up a flag on Mun or Minmus? Or even another planet? I know I do =P

Well here is your chance, just download this part and strap it onto a decoupler on your ship before heading on off to one of the famous Kerbin moons and once landed just eject it off the side and watch it float down to the ground and stay standing.

(A Special thanks to Runescope who has made a flag generator that can be found below)

This flag comes with multiple textures which include:


  • Russian Flag
    United Kingdom Flag
    United States Of America Flag
    Canadian Flag (Made by Runescope)
    And a custom KSP Flag

It also comes with a instruction template so that you can make your very own flag texture:

Here are some screenshots or the flag in action (Please note - Its not upright cos I hit it with my decoupler ):

Changes:

- Added Canadian flag to the pack (Thanks to Runescope)

- Edited the model slightly to make more sturdy

-----------------------------------

- Fixed all textures

- Added a better node_collider (So now it will almost never fall down)

-----------------------------------

- Added X legs on bottom so more chance of standing

-----------------------------------

- Released

Issues:

- May only work connected to a decoupler.

Edit:

New flag with template added. Gave the flag pole a metalic look.

Edit:

I reduced the crash tolerance to 20. I was ejecting flags in orbit (catastrophic failure) and found they would survive re-entry and survive impact with the ground. By reducing the crash tolerance, fast moving flags will be destroyed.

I also reduced the ejection force from 10 to 5 so that a flag \'drops\' to the surface and not go flying across the ground.
